description: Try our easy to follow Lamb & Vegetable Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rogan josh,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato,Spinach,Cauliflower
name: Lamb & Vegetable Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and carrot and cook for 3 minutes. Add lamb and fry, turning occasionally until golden. Reduce heat to low. Stir in curry paste, coconut milk and 1/3 cup water. Stir well to combine. Add eggplant, cauliflower and tomatoes. Cover and simmer for 30 minutes until lamb and vegetables are tender. Stir in spinach.
Mix yoghurt and mint together and heat rice as per packet instructions. Top curry with yoghurt mixture and serve with rice.
